Test Name: HIV-1/HIV-2 Antibodies + P24 Antigen Combination Immunoassay (4th Generation)
Purpose: To detect HIV-1/HIV-2 antibodies and P24 antigen for early diagnosis of HIV infection.
Container: Serum separator tube or plasma tube with EDTA, heparin, or citrate anticoagulant
Equipment: Automated immunoassay analyzer (e.g., Abbott Architect, Roche Cobas e411)
